name: Barren Lands
description:
Explore empty lands with only one lifeline. 

Make your way across the nothingness. 

What will you find in the desert?

A game by

Mylene Ben Osman 
Daniel Røskaft |
Martim Grosner

Thank you to 

Martin Bremer

Gereon Plättner

Tung Cao

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Building Worlds"  (Spring Semester 2021)
